QuestData.Title: Raiders of the Lost Crop
QuestData.Description: I could use a hand here!$b$bSo there I was, mindin' my own business and collectin' my harvest when these big galoots show up on their wolves and start torching the town! Luckily I was delivering a sack o' grain, or they'd have caught me and run me down!$b$bI won't stand for having these orcs or their dogs chewing up my fields or my crop.$b$bWhat do you say, friend? Help a farmer run some looters off his land?
QuestData.RewardText: Hah, that'll teach them to come here with their pooches and steal our grain!
